post.author: Admin
post.title: Volunteers Needed for Marching Band Concert
post.description:
Dear Band Families,
We only have a few days before the Marching Band Concert on Wednesday, Novembe
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

We only have a few days before the Marching Band Concert on Wednesday, November 4, 2015. After the concert the band members and their families will enjoy bakery and beverages. Obviously we need a few volunteers to help make sure this event goes smoothly.

Thank you to everyone that has already responded to our request for help! We do need of a few more volunteers to ensure this event goes well, please view the Signup Genius link and if you could help out it would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

Helen Kelly Hospitality Committee
